en.title: Dr Emoto's Seminar In Kuala Lumpur 03rd April 2010 A Great Success! (2)

meta.description: World Renowned Scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's Seminar in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia "The Power Of Scalar Energy Water" on 03rd April 2010 was a HUGE SUCCESS with over 2000 participants who came from all over Malaysia and surrounding countries. It was one thing to read his best selling books, some of which sold over 2 million copies, and another thing to see and hear him live, delivering his findings and research on "living" water. FE is very proud and honoured to be able to bring Dr Emoto to share his knowledge and research with our Leaders and Members in KL (03rd April), Bangkok (04th April), Jakarta (09th April), Manila (10th April) and Hong Kong (11th April).
meta.keyword: Dinner, Malaysia, Laos, Miss Malaysia, Natasha, FE, Directors, Mock Cheque
meta.author: KLHunter
